an5.240:3.1: piyo ca sobhano → ābhāvanīyo piyasobhanā ca (bj); āvāsiko appiyasobhanā ca (sya-all)
an5.240:3.4: Macchariyā duvepi cāti → yathābhataṃ cādi tayo avaṇṇārahā duve macchariyā ca vuttā (bj); catukkamaccherapañcakena cāti (si, sya-all); catukkamacchariyena cāti (pts-vp-pli1ed); catuko macchariyena cāti (mr)
